md:
giải nghĩa từ "features" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa
1. Features (noun)
	* Meaning: Đặc điểm, tính năng, đặc trưng
	* Part of speech: noun
	* Example sentence: The new smartphone has many impressive features, including a high-quality camera and long battery life.
	* Related words: characteristics, attributes, properties
	* Synonyms: characteristics, attributes, properties

2. Features (verb)
	* Meaning: Đưa ra, trình bày, giới thiệu
	* Part of speech: verb
	* Example sentence: The movie features a star-studded cast, including Leonardo DiCaprio and Julia Roberts.
	* Related words: presents, showcases, highlights
	* Synonyms: presents, showcases, highlights

Note: The meaning of "features" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. In the first example, "features" refers to the characteristics or attributes of a product, while in the second example, it means to present or showcase something.

Features (noun) * Meaning: Đặc điểm, tính năng, đặc trưng * Part of speech: noun * Example sentence: The new smartphone has many impressive features, including a high-quality camera and long battery life. * Related words: characteristics, attributes, properties * Synonyms: characteristics, attributes, properties

  1. Features (verb)
